duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and manage sales related activity within the Food Service segment, including managing existing business and creating new business development opportunities.
Responsible for market growth and innovation, and understanding engineering related to packaging, including the foam, plastics, and fiber industries.
Identify new target markets and customers, and initiate and develop relationships with those identified.
Assist in analyzing sales data, developing and managing sales forecasts, maintaining market knowledge, and communicating with manufacturing to understand customer technical needs.
Attend and represent the company at trade functions, expos, seminars, and customer functions, and stay informed on industry trends and developments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field. Food Service technical experience preferred.
